label: SOEP Pretest
description: Within the framework of SOEP the questionnaires are prepared by so-called "pretests" for the respectively upcoming year. Their particular aim is to prove newly affiliated sets of questions or modifications of certain questions. Furthermore behavioral experiments are prepared and tested in a pretest and sometimes even included partially in the main survey of the SOEP afterwards. A pretest in the SOEP usually includes about 1000 respondents. The samples are representative by approximation for the population aged 16 years and older in Germany. Data are obtained and collected from Infratest and passed to the SOEP and other external users.
